definition: lit. to appear and disappear unpredictably like a spirit or a ghost (idiom)/fig. elusive
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
(negative prefix for verbs)/have not/not
drowned/to end/to die/to inundate

sentences.english: And caught on camera in the wild for the first time the elusive Borneo rhino.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一次在野外拍摄到神出鬼没的婆罗州犀牛。

sentences.english: This guerrilla detachment which mysteriously appeared and disappeared kept the invaders constantly on the run.
sentences.chinese: 这支神出鬼没的游击队搞得侵略者疲于奔命。

sentences.english: Elusive goal to steal notice, playing the police in their hands.
sentences.chinese: 神出鬼没地盗取预告的目标，玩弄警察于掌中。

sentences.english: Appear and disappear mysteriously of an interlink killer, kill with extremely brutal gimmick female.
sentences.chinese: 一个连环杀手神出鬼没，以极其残酷的手法杀害女性。

definition: come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and leave without a trace
lit. come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and go without a trace
pinyin: lai2 wu2 ying3 , qu4 wu2 zong1

to appear and disappear unpredictably
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
crafty/cunning/sly
secretive/furtive/surreptitious
to come and go/to roam about (mostly unseen)/(of a ghost) to haunt (a place)/(of a criminal) to stalk (the streets)/(of the sun) to rise and set
to do sth when least expected (idiom); to catch sb off guard
demon/monster
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
(coll.) unexpectedly
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
in hiding
